attributes.action: Abolish road tax but include lost funds AND third party insurance on fuel thereby making impossible for anyone to have no tax/insurance AND ensure that those who USE the roads most Pay the most
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Abolish road tax but include lost funds AND third party insurance on fuel thereby making impossible for anyone to have no tax/insurance AND ensure that those who USE the roads most PAY the most. 

This would have a welcome environmental effect plus prevent anyone not being covered (third party) in case of an accident. People who want fully comprehensive insurance could then opt for a "top up" policy.
